SELECT p.product_no as productNo, p.product_name as productName, to_char(p.product_price , '999,999,999,999,999') as productPrice, p.product_category_no as productCategoryNo, i.img_oname as imgOname, i.img_sname as imgSname, i.img_type as imgType FROM( SELECT product_no, product_name, product_category_no, product_price FROM( SELECT product_no, product_name, product_category_no, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_sellcount DESC ) WHERE rownum <= 4 ) p JOIN products_img i ON p.product_no = i.product_no AND i.img_state = 1
